channel.title: Posts on Yawar's website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Yawar's website

item.title: Three takeaways from 2023
item.description: The last sun of 2023 will set in a few hours, and I would like to take this moment to reflect and capture some of the most important takeaways of the past year for me.

item.title: How to get to know your gut feeling?
item.description: There is a good chance that we have all heard of gut feeling.

item.title: Flood relief operation in Pakistan
item.description: I am pleased to share that we have successfully completed the relief operation for the flood victims in Pakistan.

item.title: What is success in life?
item.description: It was my pleasure to have a conversation with Wilbert Wijns about the meaning of success in life.

item.title: Change can be overwhelming, but transformational change leads you to profound growth
item.description: I have been going through quite a few changes lately and I thought it might be good to document my thoughts at this stage.

item.title: Five principles for a great travelling experience
item.description: When our plane was about to land at Bucharest International Airport, I was full of all kinds of questions and prejudices about Romania.

item.title: Two lessons I learned from writing eight papers
item.description: What have I learned from writing eight papers over the past four years?
